item.title: [Pi] FightCaves [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

I’m fixing up my fight caves and got this error when I compiled.

src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2264: cannot find symbol symbol : variable fightCaves location: class server.Server Server.fightCaves.spawnNextWave(c); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I don’t understand why it gives me that error, I’ve imported FightCaves into my playerAssistant, and spawnNextWave is in my FightCave.java, here is what it looks like.

public void spawnNextWave(Client c) { if (c != null) { if (c.waveId >= WAVES.length) { c.waveId = 0; return; } if (c.waveId < 0){ return; } int npcAmount = WAVES[c.waveId].length; for (int i = 0; i < npcAmount; i++) { int npc = WAVES[c.waveId][i]; int X = coordinates[i][0]; int Y = coordinates[i][1]; int H = c.heightLevel; int hp = HP[i][0]; int max = MAX[i][0]; int atk = ATK[i][0]; int def = DEF[i][0]; Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, npc, X, Y, H, 0, hp, max, atk, def, true, false); } c.tzhaarToKill = npcAmount; c.tzhaarKilled = 0; } }

Does anybody have any ideas how I can fix this?

Read full topic
